question:
This song is for question no. 42-44!    Flashlight
Jessie J
When tomorrow comes
I'll be on my own
Feeling frightened of
The things that I don't know
When tomorrow comes Tomorrow comes
Tomorrow comes
And though the road is long
I look up to the sky
And in the dark I found,
I lost hope that I won't fly
And I sing along, I sing along
And I sing along
I got all I need when I got you and I
I look around me, and see a sweet life
I'm stuck in the dark but you're my
flashlight
You're getting me, getting me
through the night
Kick start my heart when you shine it in
my eyes
Can't lie, it's a sweet life
I'm stuck in the dark but
you're my flashlight
You're getting me, getting me
through the night
'Cause you're my flashlight (flashlight)
You're my flashlight (flashlight)
You're my flash
42. What is the song about?
A. The singer's new flashlight.
B. The singer's day after tomorrow.
C. The singer's dark side.
D. The singer's special one.
43. How does the writer feel about tomorrow?
A. Happy
B. Sad
C. Scared
D. Stuck
44. Why does the singer sing this song?
A. To show her feeling about tomorrow
B. To help people overcome their problem
C To ask for help because she is always frightened
D. To express her gratitude to have that someone by her side​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

42. A

43. C

44. A/D

Penjelasan:

menurutku itu,tapi kalau mau yang lain gapapa

related_questions.question: Fill in the blank with following verbs (lived ,came,went ,did,was)6. the crocodile ....hungry 7. my father ....to his office this morning 8.they ...to my party last sunday 9. the queen ...in the jungle 10. ....you watch the show yesterday

answers.answer:
~ Answer:

6. (e) was

The crocodile was hungry.

7. (c) went

My father went to his office this morning.

8. (b) came

They came to my party last Sunday.

9. (a) lived

The Queen lived in the jungle.

10. (d) did

Did you watch the show yesterday?

.

~ Discussion:

Halo dan salam kenal. Mari kita bahas cara penyelesaian pernyataan-pernyataan di atas dengan kata kerja yang sesuai ya.

「

Kita nyatakan semua pernyataan dalam bentuk pekerjaan/keberadaan yang berada di masa lalu yang menggunakan past tense.

」

》6. The crocodile ... hungry.

  • Kalimat ini termasuk bentuk nominal. Setiap kalimat nominal dibantu oleh kata kerja bantu (helping verb).

Helping verb untuk verbal form adalah did sedangkan nominal form adalah was/were.

—> jawabannya: e. was

》7. My father ... to his office this morning.

  • Kita dapat menyatakan dengan went. Alasannya karena adanya kata to menunjukkan tujuan kepergian. Dalam konteks ini, lebih sesuai dengan went ketimbang came karena subyek yang berada di tempat berasalnya akan meninggalkan tempat itu ke tempat lain sehingga diartikan bukan "datang" melainkan "pergi".

—> jawabannya: c. went

》8. They ... to my party last Sunday.

  • Adanya kata to menunjukkan tujuan kehadiran. Menurut konteks ini, subyek yang sudah tidak berada di tempat asalnya, sudah berada di tempat lain. Tempat lain itulah yang ditargetkan sehingga mereka menjadi "datang" bukan "pergi".

—> jawabannya: b. came

》9. The Queen ... in the jungle.

  • Kalimat di atas menyatakan keberadaan subyek. Kita dapat melengkapinya dengan kata kerja lived.

—> jawabannya: a. lived

》10. ... you watch the show yesterday?

  • Adanya tanda tanya membuktikan kalimat tersebut dalam bentuk interogatif.

Kalimat tersebut ada verba watch sehingga termasuk kalimat verbal. Gunakan kata kerja bantu did.

—> jawabannya: d. did

~ Thank you and hope this answer may be helpful.

Good luck! ✿

related_questions.question: Bantu jawab plis pelajaran bhs inggris ​

Dinda    (run) so fast because there
(be) a dog
Mia and her friend
(borrow) some books from the library
The school janitor
(sweep) the floor last night.
Mr Betty
(teach) and
(speak) English in the class.
My family
(miss) the plane because we (wake up) late​

answers.answer:
Dinda is running so fast because there is a dog

Mia and her friends are borrowing some books from the library

The school janitor was sweeping the floor last night

My Betty teaches and speaks English in the class

My Family missed the plane because we woke up late

related_questions.question:
Rudi is a junior high school student. He goes to SMP 13    everyday. He goes to school on foot (jalan kaki).
Rudi likes playing gootball and basket ball every week.
He never comes late to scholl. He always respects
(menghormati) and obeys (mematuhi) his parents and
teachers.
29. Who is Rudi?
a. A student
b. A teacher
c. A player
d. A football player

30. Where is he studying? 
a. SMP 12 c. SMP 14
b. SMP 13 d. A football player

31. How does he go to school?
a. By bisycle c. By bus
b. By car d. on foot 

32. Does he like basketball? 
a. Yes, he don't c. Yes, he does
b. Yes, he liket d. Yes, he did
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

29. a. A student

30. b. SMP 3

31. d. On foot

32. c. Yes, he does

Penjelasan:

Semoga membantu..

29. A. A Student

30. B. SMP 13

31. D. On Foot

32. C. Yes, He Does

related_questions.question:
13. Lani    : Lara, your bag is cool. It has simple design but luxurious. It's awesome.
Lara : Thanks. My father bought it for me yesterday,
From the dialog we know that ...
A. Lara's bag is new
B. Lani dislikes the bag
C. the bag is expensive
D. Lara bought the bag yesterday.​
